issue.title: [CF 1311] Track companion pets health
issue.body:
Hello, I'm pet-battling a lot in Legion, and I created a TMW that tracks "Revive pets" if I have the Safari Hat buff.

But, I would like to track it only when my pets are not at 100% health. I've searched the conditions several times and I did not find any related to companion pets. I don't think they're implemented.

It is a very minor feature but it would made my life easier :)


> Posted by CurseForge user JabboHunter | Imported from CurseForge issue #1311 | Raw
